text: __NOTOC__ Erich Fronhöfer (27 December 1895 – 12 January 1970) was a German general in the Wehrmacht of Nazi Germany during World War II. ==Awards and decorations== * Knight's Cross of the Iron Cross on 24 July 1941 as Oberstleutnant and commander of Panzer-Regiment 10 Category:1895 births Category:1970 deaths Category:People from East Prussia Category:German military personnel of World War I Category:Prussian Army personnel Category:Major generals of the German Army (Wehrmacht) Category:Recipients of the Knight's Cross of the Iron Cross Category:Recipients of the clasp to the Iron Cross, 1st class
title: Erich Fronhöfer
